quote.msg: 以前學過兩三個學期，啲音都吹得唔係好實

replies.msg: 唔實係因為你味搵埋個音個位置，一係用得太多氣，一係口嚨太緊或者口腔內空間太多、再或者吸氣動作做錯，好多時一吸氣就壓住錯前面（肺），要用諗多d背部同後腦resonance 位

quote.msg: 以前個老師太on9 考完八級冇再學 依家想pick up番 有咩建議可以點練？

replies.msg:
練番長音，要feel到每一個音嘅位置同音色
好慢咁練，之後再練scale,記住scale 其實唔係練你手指速度，目標應該係練聲音平均同tone colour 仲有pitch
如果有心想練番好，建議用grands exercices journaliers – taffanel et gaubert
練E.J 3
識唔識震音

我幾年冇吹過，而家想pick up 返，但係我之前都淨係學到intermediate就放棄咗，究竟有啲咩嘢skills我係要識？（e.g. 吹semiquiver 條唎要tukutuku)
同埋我想問連音(堆音符上面有條Arch連住）同普通音吹係嚟有咩分別？

quote.msg:
我幾年冇吹過，而家想pick up 返，但係我之前都淨係學到intermediate就放棄咗，究竟有啲咩嘢skills我係要識？（e.g. 吹semiquiver 條唎要tukutuku)
同埋我想問連音(堆音符上面有條Arch連住）同普通音吹係嚟有咩分別？

replies.msg:
要識single, double, triple (tt...,tk...,tkt...)
唔一定吹semiquiver 要double, 睇tempo 同自己習慣做人，總之唔影響accuracy 就ok
有條arch係d音上面係slur，只係第一個音要t之後連住，再轉fingering同氣

本身玩clarinet，但吹flute個陣完全唔夠氣 自學唔到，想問下係應該點比氣

quote.msg: 本身玩clarinet，但吹flute個陣完全唔夠氣 自學唔到，想問下係應該點比氣

replies.msg:
要由吸氣開始講
放鬆身體，吸氣要好似打喊露咁，吸入丹田，同feel 到背脊擴開。
千其唔好諗用氣行先，首先要好似唱聲樂咁hug 到個音高，要feel到條頸至後腦，搵啱每一個音嘅正確位置，之後鬆少少丹田，hug住個音升d氣上去同時帶出少少氣就ok，只需要好少氣就有聲
吹長笛係好似唱聲樂，只不過你唔唱出聲，而係唱落支笛到，同支笛共鳴而發生聲音

要詳細講有排講用氣係所有管樂最難嘅地方同技巧，其他fingering 同Tonguing都係建基於正確嘅運氣方式，其他野一d都唔難，運氣最難

留名學野
想問下點樣可以練得成循環呼吸

quote.msg:
留名學野
想問下點樣可以練得成循環呼吸

replies.msg:
長笛唔洗用循環呼吸亦好難用到因為長笛係一一個開放式嘅管樂（冇野含住），唔似oboe,clarinet 同bassoon 果d, 好難一路出氣一路吸
小弟就唔識循環呼吸亦都唔建議用，因為會好容易谷住咗咗d氣影響聲音，大師都唔會用

Sorry 幫你唔到
吹極都好似太多氣聲 係咪口型唔啱

quote.msg: 吹極都好似太多氣聲 係咪口型唔啱

replies.msg: 你用好多氣先有聲？口型個個唔同，但前提係要放鬆，口內唔好有空間（金魚嘴），如果你d氣感覺由嘴巴吹出就錯，要feel 到鼻同頭嘅共嗚位

要睇老師profile, 擇Music conservatoire graduate,
例如：HKAPA graduate
不過通常都好少收入門學生（要熟人介紹）

香港都有兩間專門只學長笛嘅Music studio(琴行）
你自己Google吓
通常你去連鎖琴行學都係好參差，d老師好業餘

最後就係識音樂圈嘅入介紹好老師

利申：好老師/勁嘅老師就自然收得貴d ,初學冇級有d都可以收～500/hr, 值唔值就見仁見智

quote.msg: 以前個老師太on9 考完八級冇再學 依家想pick up番 有咩建議可以點練？
點on9法

replies.msg: 基本上每堂淨係run一次考試歌同埋比一首其他嘅作品我吹，但detail位完全冇講，吹得唔好嘅位淨係識叫我放慢黎練，到我考之前同伴奏夾先發現原來d articulation、大細聲、音樂感、吸氣位自己做到錯曬， 係個伴奏提番我先知原來要點做，唔係個伴奏嘅話我應該淨係攞到pass

#83
自己上網搵果兩間野，或者可以搵私人老師
Ching budget 幾多先？要好老師就一定要肯比多d錢同埋唔好去果d大型連鎖琴行

I'm a flutist. In the past few years, I've performed in concerts several times which have attracted widespread critical acclaim in the media. My last few concerts attracted audiences of more than one thousand. Recently, I was interviewed on a news telwvision channel for the first time to promote my recital. I was a little nervous since it was my first time being interviewed on television but it was an enjoyable experience. I graduated with a master's degree in flute performance from a music conservatory in London. While studying there, I performed frequently in festivals, concert halls in many universities and cathedrals. Besides performing, I also do flute accompaniment so I always have rehearsals with violists, clarinetists, et cetera. I also teach flute but I only teach the talented ones because some of the students are forced by their parents to learn to play the flute which they aren't really interested in learning. They don't do much practice. How many times do you go to the gym per week? I'm a gym lover. I go to the gym three to four times a week. I would say I'm lean and strong. I don't wanna be too big like a bodybuilder because if I were, I'd be so clumsy and my hands and fingers wouldn't be nimble enough to play the flute. I also enjoy hiking and playing basketball and badminton. Maybe you could be my hiking buddy. Do yoy like to travel to other countries on vacation? How many countries have you been to? I've been to many countries on vacation. I had always thought that many other countries were better than Hong Kong but after I vacationed in these countries, I realized that in terms of city life, nightlife, food and shopping, Hong Kong really is the best. In Europe, shops close at four on weekdays and don't open on the weekends except big cities l
like London in which shops close at six on weekdays and four on weekends. Their main sorts of entertainmenf are pubs and clubs. Las Vegas has spectacular night views but it was primarily built for tourism. It's famous for gambling, unique hotel design and shows like boxing events. However, in terms of scenery, Scandinavia and Tibet are the most ravishing I would say. Tibet is famous for its breathtaking view at high altitude. Xinjiang is also a place of outstanding scenic beauty. If you think you might have altitude sickness, I suggest that you bring some medicine along with you. In fact, my friend who's just been to the Mount Everest base caml showed me her photos taken there by which I was awestruck. It's definitely a glamorous vacation spot. A tour of the Mount Everest base camp would be a once in a lifetime experience. Tibet is also the best place for stargazing, I would say, since it's much closer to the heavens than any other places on earth and the sky at night is often clear and cloudless. It has some of thr highest lakes in the world that are rich with fish and other marine life and the surrounding countryside is inhabited by flocks of yellow ducks and wild horses as well as donkeys. The lakes there, such as Lake Paiku, reflect the beauty of the stars, giving a double view of the sky at night. You can even pitch caml there to get the best view of the stars and the Milky Way galaxy.

I'm gonna print off the score of Ravel concerto.
I thoroughly recommend that you choose Isaac to be your flute teacher.
推

I'm considering getting a temporary job in The Four Seasons in January or February because I'm interested in working there temporarily. It'll expand my vocabulary and I'm sure it'll be an extraordinary experience. The air conditioning in The Four Seasons is sometimes set too low. My friend Jeremy who's a vegetarian loves to have coconuts and shea butter in Honolulu and Malaysia. He's gonna print off a copy of his visa and the score of Sergei Rachmaninoff concerto for bassoon teaching. I thoroughly recommend that you choose Jeremy to be your bassoon teacher. I remember going to Winter Wonderland with you where we went on one of the thrill rides which was very tall. It was for eight people only; four people at the top, four at the bottom. Then it kept circling. Do you remember? I remember you were a little nervous because when we were queuing, I was talking to you but you were suddenly silent.

巴打你好
真超新手自學緊，問點樣拎笛先啱
初學吹GAB 都ok 但一吹C 啲手指離開枝笛
右手就拎唔實就跌咁/真係跌，可以點改善

quote.msg:
巴打你好
真超新手自學緊，問點樣拎笛先啱

replies.msg:
笛頭個孔對住第一粒key,笛尾支post 轉到前面個key嘅中間
左手用虎口位卡住支笛，右手輕輕托住支笛（手指公放係右手第一個key 下方左右）

BTW 我估你應該係講c# right? c 音應該唔會點跌，左手仲有食指，c# 就麻煩少少，因為只得尾指

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_qjFNxsbL7HIPnOMwYbZn9A1b_XVGYyI
